name: Cohanoi Oppuzzle
description:
Tower of Hanoi, now with an AI co-op partner to mess things up! It has a plan and you need to read its mind, is pretty much how it goes.

Controls

  • Mouse  - click things
  • R - restart current level
  • N/P - Next/Previous level
  • Esc - escape the program

Developer's comments

Despite much thinking the AI still bugs out in one of the levels by skipping turns. Hmm. Didn't have time to fix that, but it is not a biggie.

Originally made for Alakajam 7, 2019

Font by Dieter Steffmann
